plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fantasy, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland are set in alternative realities. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be survival, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland feature characters struggling to survive in hostile environments. The user's favourite setting is likely to be an island, as Lord of the Flies is set on an island. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be descriptive, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland feature detailed descriptions of settings and characters. The user's favourite length is likely to be medium, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland are of medium length. The user's favourite topic is likely to be identity, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland explore the theme of identity. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be slow, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland feature a slow pace. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be third-person omniscient, as both Lord of the Flies and Alice's Adventures in Wonderland are written in this narrative structure. The user's favourite themes are likely to be morality and ethics, as The Virtue of Selfishness explores these themes.
